Traits.Name: Vigilance
Traits.Description: Foes can’t dash in your engagement and can’t move through your space.

Traits.Name: Slow
Traits.Description: Go after all other characters. If multiple characters take slow turns, it takes the same order as regular turns (ally/enemy/ally).

Traits.Name: Heavy Armor
Traits.Description: Immune to pierce when not bloodied. Cannot dash or run.

Traits.Name: Flank
Traits.Description: If adjacent to 2 or more hostile characters, lose all armor.

Actions.Name: Crush Bones
Actions.Description: Choose an adjacent foe. If that marked foe is adjacent to the Armor Demon at the end of any of their turns, they take heavy piercing damage as an effect.
